dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Hey sweety, did you also have a strange dream?

dialogue1.speaker: $nameCat
dialogue1.text: Meow

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Something is not right, I should talk to the Professor.

dialogue1.speaker: $nameCat
dialogue1.text: Meow?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Let's go to his office!

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Hello Professor!

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: Hello $name, did you find some rest?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I couldn't say... I had this dream again.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
they
dialogue1.text: Didn't we do everything as it is written in the books? Why won't "they" leave me alone.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Professor? Don't tell me it was all for nothing!!

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: No need to be overly dramatic, we did everything right. You need to give it more time, your soul hasn't realized the new situation yet.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: What should I do?

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: I have a small task for you, this will surely lift up your spirits.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Nods

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: A new artifact made it's way to town. With it we can finally make everything right. Have you ever heard of Lois?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Shakes head

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
item
dialogue1.text: She is an old friend of mine, got to her and tell her I sent you to receive the "item". Can you do that for me?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: You know I can! I will bring it to you ASAP.

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: How can I help you honey? You seem lost.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Are you Lois?

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: The one and only, who is asking?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I'm $name, Professor Weintraub has sent me to get an "item".

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: You work with that old geezer? My condolences. But business is business. Yeah I heard chatter on the streets that someone is willing to surrender it for the right price.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: And what would that price be?

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: A piece of the meteor of course, that's is all the rage right now.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I see what I can do.

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: I would take a look around the meteor crater if I where you, perhaps you will get lucky.

dialogue1.speaker: Agent Scully
dialogue1.text: What do you think you are doing here?!?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I'm just having a stroll through the park.

dialogue1.speaker: Agent Scully
dialogue1.text: Then stroll somewhere else, will you?!

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I need a way to find a piece of the meteor. Perhaps someone saw something

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Hello Pete.

dialogue1.speaker: Stinky Pete
dialogue1.text: Stinky Pete if you will!

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I'm sorry - Stinky Pete.

dialogue1.speaker: Stinky Pete
dialogue1.text: Manners are important.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Word is that you are the one to come to, for meteorite scraps.

dialogue1.speaker: Stinky Pete
dialogue1.text: Perhaps.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Perhaps we can make a deal?

dialogue1.speaker: Stinky Pete
dialogue1.text: Actually I lost something - My lucky bottle, it fell right down a storm drain, when the F.B.I. people removed me from my usual spot. When you find it we can be friends.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: We'll do.

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: Hello Hon, back already? You are quick to deliver.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I don't have it yet, but I have a source.

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: Uhh, how facinating.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I need to get into the sewers, do you know a way in?

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: Of course I do. But it comes at a price. Catch me on of those Beasts and you can have the key, here take this cage.

dialogue1.speaker: Stinky Pete
dialogue1.text: Thank you stranger, your good manners will be rewarded.

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: Well look at that, I was kidding, but you did it anyway. I should ask you more often to retrieve items for me. Tell the Professor that I will get the "item" for him and he can lay his rotting head to rest

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: She is always a blast, you did good. Rest now, tommorow will be a huge day for you and me, we need to be at our best.

dialogue1.speaker: $nameCat
dialogue1.text: Meow?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: No, the dream is still there.

dialogue1.speaker: $nameCat
dialogue1.text: Meow?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: You're right, I should talk to the Professor again.

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: You look dreadfull hon, what happened

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I can't find the Proffesor, do you have an idea where he could be?

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: We met today at the break of dawn, always a good time for a deal, not that there is a bad time to earn some money.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Do you know where he went after that?

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: Not really. The old man said something about "only one thing is missing now" and then left.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Thank you Lois.

dialogue1.speaker: Lois
dialogue1.text: Don't mention it, I mean it. My reputation is important for my business.

dialogue1.speaker: Mr. Paulsen
dialogue1.text: Please don't touch anything.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Have you seen Professor Weintraub today?

dialogue1.speaker: Mr. Paulsen
dialogue1.text: No... I have not. Why would you think that?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I was told he was here.

dialogue1.speaker: Mr. Paulsen
dialogue1.text: Okay okay, stop the interrogation, I confess. He was here.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I wasn't... I ...

dialogue1.speaker: Mr. Paulsen
dialogue1.text: And I gave him what he wanted... I'm ashamed myself.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: And what would that be?

dialogue1.speaker: Mr. Paulsen
dialogue1.text: I is a book.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: ... that much was obvious.

dialogue1.speaker: Mr. Paulsen
dialogue1.text: I guess your right, but it was not any old book. This book has power

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: What do you mean.

dialogue1.speaker: Mr. Paulsen
dialogue1.text: I can't tell you more otherwise you would be doomed too. Just leave it at that and hope that the Professor will never use it. You need to go now

dialogue2.speaker: $name
dialogue2.text: What do you make of this?

dialogue2.speaker: $name
dialogue2.text: That sound dangerous. But you are right, we need to find the Professor.

dialogue1.speaker: Agent Scully
dialogue1.text: What are you doing here, do you work with that lunatic old geezer?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Have you seen the Profssor

dialogue1.speaker: Agent Scully
dialogue1.text: Do I look like someone who cares about the academic title of someone who attacks me?!?

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: What do you mean?

dialogue1.speaker: Agent Scully
dialogue1.text: The old fart came up to me and hit me on the head, next thing I knew we were down here and he cut my arm with a strange knife, said something and this doorway opened.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: I need to go after him!

dialogue1.speaker: Agent Scully
dialogue1.text: Do what you want, but leave me out of it, when you come back out there will be dozens of agent waiting for the both of you.

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: I knew you would come my child.

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: What are you doing Professor?

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: As soon as I heard of your dreams, I knew it had to be you!

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Professor? What are you talking about?

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: Come here my child, fullfill your destiny!

dialogue1.speaker: $name
dialogue1.text: Professor, why can't I stop?

dialogue1.speaker: Professor Weintraub
dialogue1.text: We will end it here, right now. Believe me, it will be great.

dialogue2.speaker: $name
dialogue2.text: I don't know, the Professor, he wasn't himself... I think...

dialogue2.speaker: Agent Scully
dialogue2.text: It is alright, we will take it from here.

dialogue3.speaker: $name
dialogue3.text: What do you think did the Professor talk about?

dialogue3.speaker: $name
dialogue3.text: You're right: Thank you $nameCat for saving me in there. Your treats are well earned.
